content: 4th st from hook double_crochet in each chain across chain 3 turn 16 double_crochet row 2 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet across chain 3 turn 16 double_crochet row 3 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 13 double_crochet leaving last 2 sts unworked turn 14 double_crochet row 4 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 13 sts chain 3 turn 13 double_crochet row 5 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 11 double_crochet leaving last st unworked turn 12 double_crochet row 6 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 11 double_crochet chain 3 turn 11 double_crochet row 7 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in 8 double_crochet leaving last 2 sts unworked turn 9 double_crochet row 8 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 8 double_crochet chain 3 turn 8 double_crochet row 9 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet leaving last st unworked turn 7 double_crochet row 10 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 6 sts fasten_off weave in ends 6 double_crochet sleeves make 2 foundation chain with mc and size n hook chain 12 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in each chain across chain 3 turn 10 double_crochet row 2 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn 10 double_crochet row 3-10 repeat row 2 8 times more do not fasten_off chain 1 turn piece and working in row ends work 20 single_crochet evenly spaced along side edge chain 3 turn ruffle work 2 double_crochet in 1st single_crochet and 3 double_crochet in each remaining single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends 60 double_crochet assembly sew shoulder seams mark 3 from shoulder seams on right side mark with stitch marker or piece of contrasting yarn fold sleeves so ruffle is on outside edge sew bottom seam sew sleeves in place from shoulder to marker sew side seam repeat for left side weave in ends edging with right side facing size n hook and cc join yarn with slip_stitch to bottom side seam chain 1 work 1 row of single_crochet spaced evenly around entire piece working single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in each corner joine with slip_stitch in 1st chain 1space fasten_off weave in ends button with size l hook and cc chain 3 join with slip_stitch in 1st chain to form a ring round 1 chain 2 work 8 half_double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch in chain 2 round 2 2 single_crochet in each half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing 16 single_crochet sew in loose end sew button to decreasing edge of left front to use button to fasten sweater pull the button between two stitches on right front as though using a buttonhole buckle using a piece of mc sew buckle to bottom of left side seam *note- you may also secure wrap with crochet instead of jeweled buckle for this method with cc and size l hook join yarn with slip_stitch at left bottom side seam chain 8 measure 1 ½ up side seam
